TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class Histogram<T> : System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Instrument<T> where T : struct
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Histogram`1<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T> extends System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Instrument`1<!T>
Public NotInheritable Class Histogram(Of T) Inherits Instrument(Of T)
type Histogram<'T (requires 'T : struct)> = class inherit Instrument<'T (requires 'T : struct)>
generic <typename T> where T : value classpublic ref class Histogram sealed : System::Diagnostics::Metrics::Instrument<T>

Docs.typeparam: The type that the histogram represents.
Docs.summary: Represents a metrics instrument that can be used to report arbitrary values that are likely to be statistically meaningful, for example, the request duration. Call to create a Histogram object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This class supports only the following generic parameter types: <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, and <xref:System.Decimal>.
